full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RJE SKAL LDAN RGYA MTSO'I GSUNG LAS BRUL GTOR DKOR SGRIB DAG BYED ZLA SHEL CHU RGYUN BZHUGS, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(CES PA 'DI YANG RI KHROD PA DGE SLONG DAM CHOS PAS NAN GYIS BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, ,PAn CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN GYIS SRAD RIN CHEN RTZE'I RDO RJE GZHAL YAS SU SBYAR BA'I BRUL GTOR GYI CHO GA LAS 'DON CHA GZHIR PHYAG BZHAG LEN GYI RIM PA RNAMS KYI ZUR THON PAR BYAS PA 'DI NI SKAL LDAN RGYA MTSOS SUG BRIS SU BYAS PA 'DIS KYANG RANG GZHAN LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,MANGGA LAm, ,)
